short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace every image of something you don't wanna see with cats, isn't that wonderful?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to swap images of something you don't like with funny images (or gifs) of kittens while surfing the internet. If you prefer cats over people you really should add this extension :)
